DataElement.preferredDefinition: The end date of the deviation represented in an unambiguous date format (e.g., DD-MON-YYYY).

ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the protocol deviati
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the protocol deviation end date?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form  Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record the end date of the protocol deviation using this format (DD-MON-YYYY). This should be the date the protocol deviation stopped and not the date it was discovered or reported.

ReferenceDocuments.name: DVENDTC
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM submission dataset, concatenate all collected CDASH END DATE and TIME components and populate the SDTMIG variable DVENDTC in ISO 8601 format.
